remarks: The predicate "is a zero object" of a category.  (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2020.)
statement:
isinito.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isinito.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isinito.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
isinito.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. B ) $.
iszeroo $p |- ( ph -> ( I e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> ( I e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ I e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) $.
